mapper.select: SELECT L.LEC_NO , LEC_NAME , LEC_SCORE ,(SELECT COLL_NAME FROM COLLEAGE WHERE COLL_NO = L.COLL_NO) AS COLL_NO , (SELECT DEPT_NAME FROM DEPT WHERE DEPT_NO = L.DEPT_NO) AS DEPT_NO , (SELECT MEM_NAME FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_NO = (SELECT MEM_NO FROM EMP WHERE EMP_NO = L.EMP_NO)) AS EMP_NO , LEC_DAY , (SELECT FIRST_TIME||'-'||LAST_TIME FROM LECTURE_TIME WHERE LEC_NO = L.LEC_NO ) AS LAST_TIME , PDF_NO , ORIGIN_PDF_NAME , ATTACHED_PDF_NAME FROM LECTURE L, LECTURE_PDF LP, LECTURE_TIME LT WHERE L.LEC_NO = LP.LEC_NO AND L.LEC_NO = LT.LEC_NO

SELECT L.LEC_NO , LEC_NAME , LEC_SCORE ,(SELECT COLL_NAME FROM COLLEAGE WHERE COLL_NO = L.COLL_NO) AS COLL_NO , (SELECT DEPT_NAME FROM DEPT WHERE DEPT_NO = L.DEPT_NO) AS DEPT_NO , (SELECT MEM_NAME FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_NO = (SELECT MEM_NO FROM EMP WHERE EMP_NO = L.EMP_NO)) AS EMP_NO , LEC_DAY , FIRST_TIME , LAST_TIME
, PDF_NO , ORIGIN_PDF_NAME , ATTACHED_PDF_NAME FROM LECTURE L, LECTURE_PDF LP, LECTURE_TIME LT WHERE L.LEC_NO = LP.LEC_NO AND L.LEC_NO = LT.LEC_NO AND L.LEC_NO = #{lecNo}
SELECT DEPT_NO , DEPT_NAME , COLL_NO FROM DEPT

SELECT D.DEPT_NO , DEPT_NAME , C.COLL_NO , COLL_NAME
FROM DEPT D , COLLEAGE C WHERE D.COLL_NO = C.COLL_NO
AND D.COLL_NO = #{collNo}
ORDER BY COLL_NO
SELECT SEM_NO , SEM_YEAR , SEMESTER , SEM_NAME FROM SEMESTER
SELECT EMP_NO , EMP_TYPE , DEPT_NO , (SELECT MEM_NAME FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_NO = EMP.MEM_NO) AS MEM_NO , COLL_NO FROM EMP
